subject: Economy
explanation_en: National income is the total value of all goods and services produced within a country's borders within a specific time period (usually a year). In simple terms, it is the money earned by all individuals, organizations, and sectors within the country.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आर्मी प्रतिक्रम (GNIL) ke सामूल्यांक (सामूल्यांक) ki समूल्यांक (समूल्यांक) की समूल्यांक (समूल्यांक) ke liye
explanation_en: National income measures the total value of goods and services produced within a country in a specific time period. It includes income from various sources like wages, salaries, profits, etc. It is an important indicator for economic growth and development.
explanation_hi: राष्ट्रीय आर्मींक (सामूल्यांक) का मतलाईएनसामूल्यांक (सामूल्यांक) या मतलाईएनसामूल्यांक (सामूल्यांक) ke liye
explanation_en: National income represents the total value of goods and services produced within a country. It is calculated by adding up the income from various sources such as wages, salaries, profits, etc. National income plays a significant role in evaluating a country's economic growth and development.
